biotools.summary:
PolyA-miner is an accurate assessment of differential alternative poly-adenylation from 3'Seq data using vector projections and non-negative matrix factorization.

More than half of human genes exercise alternative polyadenylation (APA) and generate mRNA transcripts with varying 3' untranslated regions (UTR).
